history.proof: intros t H. induction t. - constructor. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto lq: on depth: 3. - qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. srun best use: distinct_pbleaves_pl. - qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. srun best use: distinct_pbleaves_pr. - qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qsimpl use: all_pbleaves_unique. qauto use: all_pbleaves_inpb, inpb_leaf, distinct_pbleaves_l, distinct_pbleaves_r, ulist_app unfold: distinct_pbleaves.

original: intros t H. induction t. - intros. constructor. - intros. apply all_pbleaves_unique in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. rewrite <- H1. apply H0. - intros. apply all_pbleaves_unique in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. rewrite <- H1. apply H0. - intros. apply all_pbleaves_unique in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. rewrite <- H1. apply H0.
